snippet: To the Editor:    Re ''I.R.S. Is Getting a Look at Some Mortgage Applications'' (Spending It, Dec. 29), and ''How to Whip the Bullies on the Mortgage Playground'' (From the Desk Of, Dec. 29):...
lead_paragraph: To the Editor: Re ''I.R.S. Is Getting a Look at Some Mortgage Applications'' (Spending It, Dec. 29), and ''How to Whip the Bullies on the Mortgage Playground'' (From the Desk Of, Dec. 29):
abstract: Letter by William K Klein on Dec 29 article on how big mortgage lenders in California are working with Internal Revenue Service to verify incomes of certain mortgage applicants; questions what has happened to right of privacy (S)
